org.grouplens.lenskit

Interface ItemScorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractItemScorer, BiasedMFItemScorer, ConstantItemScorer, FallbackItemScorer, FunkSVDItemScorer, GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer, ItemItemScorer, ItemMeanRatingItemScorer, LeastSquaresItemScorer, PrecomputedItemScorer, RatingPredictorItemScorer, SimpleCachingItemScorer, SlopeOneItemScorer, UserMeanItemScorer, UserUserItemScorer, WeightedSlopeOneItemScorer

    public interface ItemScorer
    Score items for users. These scores can be predicted ratings, relevance scores, purchase probabilities, or any other real-valued score which can be assigned to an item for a particular user.
    Since:
    0.4

    Compatibility: Public

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SparseVector score(long user, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
      Score a collection of items.
      double score(long user, long item)
      Score a single item.
      void score(long user, MutableSparseVector scores)
      Score items in a vector.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        double score(long user,
             long item)
        Score a single item.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a score.
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The score, or Double.NaN if no score can be generated.

      • score

        @Nonnull
SparseVector score(long user,
                            @Nonnull
                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Score a collection of items.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • score

        void score(long user,
           @Nonnull
           MutableSparseVector scores)
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.
